citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1415 on
20-Sep-16.
Attempted to contact with the phone numbers on file. One phone number was not in service and this inspector left a
voice mail on the other number. There was no response and left after 1/2 hour. Sent report certified mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1415 on
20-Sep-16.
Attempted to contact with the phone numbers on file.  One phone number was not in service and this inspector left a
voice mail on the other number.  There was no response and left after 1/2 hour. Sent report certified mail.
